jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Overview
Are you interested in building products that were built on top of a massive user base and still shoot for the stars? Do you enjoy iterative software development and quickly building products with the ability to see the real-time impact of your contribution? Here is an opportunity to work with the Growth Platforms team of the fastest-growing startup in the sub-continent with 900k+ drivers, 100k+ restaurants and 900x growth in its 18 months. Our team is responsible for building growth tools covering experimentation, discovery, personalization, and promotions at scale across 20+ products.

You get to work with an insanely driven and proud team of engineers who work across Transport, Food Delivery, C2C logistics, and Mobile Payments space at a really interesting combination of scale and complexity. Oh yes, and did we mention that you get to know about and travel to countries across Southeast Asia as well!

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

• Enable different Gojek team to efficiently utilize their budgets by building and improving platform services to manage different incentive tools like vouchers, promos, subscriptions and target them to the right users at the right moment
  • Continuously improve with the overall Gojek app design and layout to delight and engage more users
  • Enable different Gojek team to efficiently utilize their budgets by building and improving platform services to manage different incentive tools like vouchers, promos, subscriptions and target them to the right users at the right moment
  • Build a platform that enables Startups to provide their services to Gojek users

• Guides the team to deliver high-quality products across different platforms
  • Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools
  • Setup test automation frameworks for products across Backend, iOS, Android, and Web
  • Ensure that the team’s CI/CD has the right setup and configuration to give the team confidence on new changes
  • Review code changes to ensure that quality requirements are met
  • Communicating & Coordinating defect fixes across multiple product teams

• 4+ years of experience in quality automation
  • Experience of working with Web, Mobile and API Testing in both manual & automation testing
  • Highly Experienced with testing frameworks such as RestAssured, TestNG, Cucumber, Appium, Espresso, XCTest, Selenium
  • Confident in writing Java code; experience writing in other languages is a plus
  • An eye for detail and consistency
  • Knowledge of Performance & Security Testing and Linux/Unix commands
